import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Slider from "react-animated-slider"; import "react-animated-slider/build/horizontal.css"; import "../../assets/css/slider.css"; const slides = [ { title: "Making Your Business Idea", description: "Our company is one of the world’s leading management consulting firms. Get in touch here asap.", btnLearn: "-- Learn More --", finan: "Afw", dox: " Malaky", btnService: "-- Register Case--", image: require("./../../assets/images/6X9A0396.00_00_59_54.Still006.jpg"), }, { title: "Making Your Business Idea", description: "Our company is one of the world’s leading management consulting firms. Get in touch here asap.", btnLearn: "-- Learn More --", finan: "Afw", dox: "Malaky", btnService: "-- Register Case--", image: require("./../../assets/images/6X9A0396.00_00_20_08.Still001.jpg"), }, { title: "Making Your Business Idea", description: "Our company is one of the world’s leading management consulting firms. Get in touch here asap.", btnLearn: "-- Learn More --", finan: "Afw", dox: "Malaky", btnService: "-- Register Case--", image: require("./../../assets/images/6X9A0396.00_00_40_10.Still002.jpg"), }, ]; class HomeSlider1 extends Component { render() { return ( <> {slides.map((slide, index) => (

{slide.title}

{slide.finan} {slide.dox}

{slide.description}
{slide.btnService}
))} {/*

Making Your Business Idea

Finandox

Our company is one of the world’s leading management
consulting firms. Get in touch here asap.
-- Our Services ---- Learn More --

Making Your Business Idea

Finandox

Our company is one of the world’s leading management
consulting firms. Get in touch here asap.
-- Our Services ---- Learn More --
*/} ); } } export default HomeSlider1;
